title: Tether Announces Board Candidates to Support Juventus’ Growth and Transformation
content: 16 October 2025: Tether is pleased to announce that it has formally submitted two candidates for consideration to join the Board of Directors (CdA) of Juventus Football Club. As stated on multiple occasions, Tether is committed to becoming a positive force of change within the Club, an ambition captured by our guiding principle: Make Juventus […]
